page.title: 14DOWNLAND GHOST STORIES.
page.content: There are many{ghost stories}of the downs; here are three. { {_________The Man and His Horse_______ Long ago, a man, riding his horse in a race, fell off. Both man and horse were killed. It is said that at every full moon the man and his horse ride on the Downs. { {____________The White Lady____________ Once on the Downs a fire killed an old lady. It is said that the same Lady in White walks the Downs every Hallowe'en { {______________The Hounds______________ A few years ago some hounds were kept at a stable. The owners, not wanting the hounds, tried to sell them. No one bought them, so they were killed. On dark foggy nights, you might hear their howls.
